document.full_text: the death toll from a monster tornado that hit joplin, missouri, rose to 125 on wednesday after an overnight search turned up more bodies but no new survivors, authorities said.
document.title: tornadoes death toll climbs
lines_and_colors: the death toll from a monster tornado that hit joplin, missouri, rose to 125 on wednesday after an overnight search turned up more bodies but no new survivors, authorities said.
